name: Stratio Cassandra
description: Cassandra index functionality has been extended to provide near real time search such as ElasticSearch or Solr, including full text search capabilities and multivariable, geospatial and bitemporal search
abstract: Cassandra index functionality has been extended to provide near real time search such as ElasticSearch or Solr, including full text search capabilities and multivariable, geospatial and bitemporal search
